subject: junit test for JavaMail
msgSnippet: Hi want to test the JavaMail through Junit. I found the summy SMTP server code. But I think it not helpin in our code senario. I want to write the test case
messageBody:
Hi want to test the JavaMail through Junit.
I found the summy SMTP server code.
But I think it not helpin in our code senario.

I want to write the test case for following one function suppose
(connect) .
Now here when I say STORE.connect(mailhost,mailuser,password), The
connection should be made to the dummy SMTP server,
Can you please gide me how to accomplish this using the "dumbster"
server


public void connect(ClassIndexedConfiguration p_configuration)
throws InitFailedException
{
//Reading all the properties from the property file.
String l_mailStoreType = p_configuration.get
(JavaMailMailbox.class, CONFIG_EMAILBATHCREATOR_MAILSTORETYPE);
Logger.log("[MailStoreType = " + l_mailStoreType + "]");
String l_mailHost = p_configuration.get(JavaMailMailbox.class,
CONFIG_EMAILBATHCREATOR_MAILHOST);
Logger.log("[MailHost = " + l_mailHost + "]");
String l_mailUser = p_configuration.get(JavaMailMailbox.class,
CONFIG_EMAILBATHCREATOR_MAILUSER);
Logger.log("[Mail User = " + l_mailUser + "]");
String l_mailPassword = p_configuration.get
(JavaMailMailbox.class, CONFIG_EMAILBATHCREATOR_MAILPASSWORD);
Logger.log("[Mail Password = " + l_mailPassword + "]");
String l_mailStoreFolder = p_configuration.get
(JavaMailMailbox.class, CONFIG_EMAILBATHCREATOR_MAILSTOREFOLDER);
Logger.log("[MailStoreFolder = " + l_mailStoreFolder + "]");
String l_environment = p_configuration.get
(JavaMailMailbox.class, CONFIG_EMAILBATHCREATOR_ENVIRONMENT);
Logger.log("[Environment = " + l_environment + "]");
String l_emailFilePath = p_configuration.get
(JavaMailMailbox.class, CONFIG_EMAILBATHCREATOR_EMAILFILEPATH);
Logger.log("[EmailFilePath = " + l_emailFilePath + "]");
// Create empty properties
Properties props = new Properties();
m_session = Session.getDefaultInstance(props, null);
// Get the store
try
{
m_store = m_session.getStore(l_mailStoreType);
Logger.log("Connecting to [" + l_mailHost + "] as [" +
l_mailUser + "/" + l_mailPassword + "]");
// Connect to store
m_store.connect(l_mailHost, l_mailUser, l_mailPassword);
// Get folder
m_folder = m_store.getFolder(l_mailStoreFolder);
}
catch (Exception ex) //Fatal exception
{
throw new InitFailedException("Cannot connect to mailbox.",
ex);
}
}
